content: 'Is that vodka?' Margarita asked weakly. The cat jumped up from its chair in indignation. 'Excuse me, your majesty,' he squeaked, 'do you think I would give vodka to a lady? That is pure spirit!'
translations: ita:È vodka quella﹖, chiese debolmente Margarita. Il gatto balzò in piedi indignato. Mi scusi, maestà, squittì, crede che da
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by sharptoothed (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
